title: Terms of use
line1: The purpose of these “terms of use” is to provide a legal framework for the terms of provision of the services of the website and their use by the “User”. The general conditions of use must be accepted by any User wishing to access the site. They constitute the contract between the site and the User. Access to the site by the User signifies acceptance of these general conditions of use. We reserve the right to unilaterally modify the content of these T & Cs at any time.

mention.title: Legal Notice
mention.text:
In accordance with the law "IT et liberties" of January 6, 1978 modified in 2004, you benefit from a right of access and of correction to the information which concerns you, which you can exert by addressing to {app_name} whose co-ordinates are below.
You can also, for legitimate reasons, oppose the treatment of the data concerning you.
mention.host: {app_name} is hosted by {host} whose registered office is located at 2 rue Kellermann - 59100 Roubaix - France.

art1.title: Article 1 : Presentation
art1.text: {app_name} is a free french internet website, accessible for everybody. All costs incurred by the User to access the service (computer hardware, software, Internet connection, etc.) are at their expense.

art2.title: Article 2 : Personal data
art2.text: Information used are author name when you publish a card, this name can be your real name or a nickname, we also use IP address in order to respect these conditions. Regarding law « IT and liberties » from 6th january updated on 2004, you have the right to access and rectify information concerning you, which you can exercise by contacting {email}.

art3.title: Article 3 : Published content
art3.text:
Your images must not: 
- contain no character inciting to hatred, 
- contain no defamatory character, 
- contain no threatening character, 
- contain no illegal character or going against any law in any way, 
- contain no sexual character (erotic, pornographic, obscene or provocative poses, ...) apart from the dedicated headings, 
- contain no personal information (name, address, e-mail, telephone...). The use that you will make of the services will not have to be: commercial, dishonest (intended not to respect the rules specific to each service). 
You commit yourself, by the use of this service, not to publish contents not conforming to the royalties or the licenses of exploitation.
You commit yourself not to post contents in connection with the use of fraudulent, pirate, or counterfeit contents. 
You commit yourselves not to post contents not respecting the French legislation in force.
You commit yourselves finally, on the honor, not to contravene the two points raised by abusing the use of our policy on the contents.

art4.title: Article 4 : Report system
art4.text: In case of problem, you have the possibility of using our alert system it will be available from a button "Report" on the card page. It should be noted that the button is available on the page associated with the image and not directly on the link of the image concerned.

art5.title: Article 5 : Sanction for non-compliance with the terms of use
art5.text:
In case of non-respect of the rules, here are the possible sanctions:
- Deletion of the incriminated images,
- Reporting to the competent authorities.

art6.title: Article 6 : Responsibilities
art6.text:
The moderation after publication does not allow {app_name} to be held responsible for the published images.
{app_name} undertakes to intervene in the event of alarm as soon as possible.
Any image contravening the rules hereafter, the law or any other code of conduct, engages only the responsibility of their author. 
Although controlled as well as possible, with a will to optimize the deadlines and the conditions of control on the contents, by right holders of the forum, the term "moderation" does not mean that {app_name} or the right holders {url} have a total control on the images. 
Any user who feels that an image sent is objectionable is encouraged to contact us immediately by e-mail or using the alert tool provided. 
In order to optimize the control over the content, {app_name} is authorized to delete, modify, move, any image that would be judged as contravening the proper functioning of the site, without prior notice, to delete, modify or suspend any member account or to delegate these rights to certain members, groups, defining the term "rightful claimants" raised. 
In order to respect the present conditions of use, IP addresses are recorded. In view of the role assigned to them, the rightful owners of {app_name} are not required to justify their actions. If a dispute seems necessary, it must be done by email.

art7.title: Article 7 : Applicable Law
art7.text: Any contribution on the {url} site is governed by the Intellectual Property Code. Each user remains the owner of his images. By publishing contributions, you authorize the company {app_name} to reference the content of your contributions on the various search engines. You renounce to sue the company {app_name} following a problem or damage caused by another user in violation of the general conditions of use.

art8.title: Article 8 : Cookies
art8.text: The site {url} is required to record cookies on your browser in order to keep your browsing preferences and to carry out statistics (Google Analytics). You can oppose this recording via the preferences of your browser.

seo.title: Create your own pokemon card | Pokemon Card Generator
seo.description: Make your own custom pokemon card, print it, then share your card with all your friends, import photos directly from your favorite application like Instagram, Facebook, Google Drive or even take a selfie with your camera

footer.description: Make custom Pokemon cards with our easy-to-use generator! Choose design options and select any information from a Pokemon card. Share your creations and view other cards made by our community. Create unique cards and take your Pokemon training to the next level!

seo.title: Gallery
seo.description: Explore pokemon cards from our community all around the world. Vote for your favorite cards or share cards you made. Who knows, you might be the next weekly winner.

how.title: How does it work ?
how.5: before the end of the countdown will be elected

no.title: No winner yet
no.description: No one got elected this week. Next winner will get elected by the end of the week when the countdown is over

modal.shareSocial: Check this out! I created {name}, my new pokemon card {href}

report.title: Report card {name}
report.description: If you determine that this card contains inappropriate content you can report it. After reporting, the moderation will determine as soon as possible if the content is abusive. If so, the card will be permanently removed from the site.
report.label: Select a reason
report.success: Your report has been sent successfully
report.error: An error occured trying to send your report

name: Name
confirmReset: Do you really want to reset your card? All changes will be lost
fileTooBig: Image file is too big ({max}Mo maximum)

requirements.title: Publishing requirements
requirements.desc: In order to publish your card, it must comply with a few requirements:
requirements.name: Write a name
requirements.attack: To have at least one attack

confirm.title: Confirm publication
confirm.desc: Publish your card to add it into the gallery and share it with the community. It will be public and visible to all users
confirm.warning: The card must not contain information that is illegal, disrespectful or likely to infringe the rights of a third party.
confirm.checkbox: By checking this box, I state that I have read and understood the General Conditions of Use.

success.title: Yeaaaah !
success.desc: Congratulations your card has been published successfully.
success.thanks: Thank you for contributing and being part of our community.
success.review: To prevent offensive cards from being uploaded, every card is subject to be reviewed.
success.email: Once your card is approved it will be available in the gallery

mainText.title: Create Your Own Custom Pokémon Cards
mainText.description: Are you a Pokémon fan looking to bring your unique ideas to life? Look no further than Pokemon Card Generator, the ultimate tool for creating custom Pokémon cards! Whether you’re a collector, a player, or just someone who loves the Pokémon universe, our website offers a seamless and fun way to design personalized Pokémon cards.
mainText.item1: Intuitive Design Interface: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy for anyone to create professional-quality Pokémon cards. With drag-and-drop functionality and a wide range of customizable options, you can design cards that look just like the ones you see in official packs.
mainText.item2: Endless Customization: Choose from a variety of card templates, backgrounds, and layouts. Customize every detail from the Pokémon’s name, type, and abilities to its artwork and stats. The possibilities are endless!
mainText.item3: Share and Print: Once you’ve designed your perfect Pokémon card, share it with friends on social media or print it out to add to your collection. Our app provides high-quality print-ready files for your convenience.
mainText.item4: Community and Inspiration: Join a community of Pokémon enthusiasts and get inspired by browsing through thousands of user-created cards. Share your designs, get feedback, and improve your card-making skills.
mainText.lasttext: Transform your Pokémon card ideas into reality with Pokemon Card Generator. Whether you want to create cards for fun, for your game, or as a gift, our website provides all the tools you need to make your designs shine.
